WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DOMINICAN REPUBLIC.
DNC 16.
VESSEL, 45 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND
TAKING ON WATER IN VICNITY 19-05.23N 068-25.55W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RSC SAN JUAN,
PHONE: 787 289 2041,
EMAIL: SSJCC@USCG.MIL.
